App.jsx.description: This page handles routing of the frontend pages.

signed-in.jsx.description: Very basic UI that displays a message and button

billing.jsx.description: Billing page for selecting a subscription

user.description: Tracks user authentication, email verification and other auth methods

create.description: Links a user record with the newly created subscription

getProducts.description: Fetches active Stripe products and prices and shapes them to be consumed on the billing page

createCheckoutSession.description: Creates a new Stripe checkout session for a given product and price using the lookupKey of a product's price

createPortalSession.description: Creates a new Stripe customer portal session for a given user

webflow.title: Stripe subscriptions
webflow.description: This template is a basic example of how to implement Stripe subscriptions in Gadget.
